component.feedback: ******You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Configure the interface connected to the ISP to acquire an address from the DHCP server.

command.deviceresponse:
SOHO(config-if)#
*Jan 31 17:31:11.507: %DHCP-6-ADDRESS_ASSIGN: Interface 
GigabitEthernet0/1 assigned DHCP address 209.165.201.12, mask 
255.255.255.224, hostname SOHO
command.instruction: Exit entirely out of configuration mode and verify the IP information on interface g0/1.

command.deviceresponse:
GigabitEthernet0/1 is up, line protocol is up 
  Internet address is 209.165.201.12/27 
  Broadcast address is 255.255.255.255 
  Address determined by DHCP 
  <output omitted>
command.instruction: You successfully configured the router as a DHCP client.
